description.fr:
{%FightStarted}
Invoque le monstre {#MONARQUE} {Summoning:439} dans l'équipe adverse.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} à la {%pvmax} et {value:percent1,percent,+} à l'{%AT} des {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Valable uniquement à 2 ou 3 joueurs sur l'{WorldZone:6}.</rem>
description.en:
{%FightStarted}
Summons the {#MONARQUE} monster {Summoning:439} on the opposing team.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} to {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other}' {%pvmax} and {value:percent1,percent,+} to their {%AT}.
\---
<rem>Valid only with 2 or 3 players on {WorldZone:6}.</rem>
description.es:
{%FightStarted}
Invoca al monstruo {#MONARQUE}{Summoning:439} en el equipo enemigo.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} a la {%pvmax} y {value:percent1,percent,+} al {%AT} de los {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Válido únicamente para 2 o 3 jugadores en la {WorldZone:6}.</rem>
description.de:
{%FightStarted}
Beschwört das {#MONARQUE}-Monster {Summoning:439} im gegnerischen Team.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} auf die {%pvmax} und {value:percent1,percent,+} auf den {%AT} der {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Gilt ausschließlich für 2 bis 3 Spieler auf der {WorldZone:6}.</rem>
description.pt:
{%FightStarted}
Invoca o monstro {#MONARQUE} {Summoning:439} na equipe adversária.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} à {%pvmax} e {value:percent1,percent,+} ao {%AT} dos {%Family_Bwork_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Válido apenas para 2 ou 3 jogadores na {WorldZone:6}.</rem>
